about_the_game:
Sadly, as Gamesparks backend support for the game will end coming September 30th, 2022, for an uncertain duration Eterna will continue to function only as an offline game. Store price will reflect this change, to be reduced as well as online purchases, leaderboard, pvp battles and a few achievements will also be unavailable for this time. We apologize for the inconvenience, and thank you for your understanding.

Zu Digital presents: an epic fantasy tale spanning decades.

The world of Eterna is in grave danger, seemingly abandoned by their creators, the mortal races bicker among themselves.
Long-standing feuds between Humans and Behemoths threaten to erupt into open conflict and it falls to you to restore order to these troubled lands



  • Be Who You Want!
    Define your features, and abilities using our in-depth character creation system
  • Choose Your Weaponry!
  • Select One Of Two Distinct Character Classes
  • Establish A Bloodline!
    Fight through multiple decades of Adventures, and begin a line of heroes.
  • Vanquish Your Foes
    Master the turn-based tactical combat system, and dominate the battlefield.
  • Make Allies and Enemies
    Fight our join other players on their quests, and experience Eterna together.

Key Features


  • Craft mighty weapons of war and armaments with the aid of gods
  • Explore the diverse and mysterious lands of Centur
  • Face horrific adversaries in combat
  • Customize your hero and create your unique champion both mechanically and cosmetically.
  • Hunt down monsters demons and beasts for great loot
  • Create your own playstyleand bent the continent to your will

Explore various areas


Leap headfirst into the unknown and explore the diverse and exotic world of Centura: delve into the deepest dungeons or climb atop the highest mountain peaks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: INTEL® CORE™ i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

short_description: Eterna: Heroes Fall is a true Old-School Turn-Based Tactical RPG featuring a storyline spanning generations, with multiple protagonists, a world filled with magic, glory, and ancient peril. Establish a bloodline of Heroes chosen by the gods to save the continent of Centura from an ancient peril.
